title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom setup and teacher's instructions
thoughts: This classroom feels very structured with all the flags and uniforms. I should pay close attention to the rules and make sure I follow them properly to fit in and avoid trouble.
memory: Noticed strict classroom structure with flags and uniforms
Preparing to follow all rules carefully

action: Maintains upright posture while discreetly observing teacher's movements for cues
thoughts: The teacher hasn't given any instructions yet but I should remain perfectly still and ready. I notice everyone else is also being very proper - I need to make sure I follow all the rules to avoid losing points.
memory: Noticing other students' compliance with rules

action: Maintains upright posture while discreetly observing teacher's clipboard for potential scoring cues
thoughts: The teacher is watching us closely with that clipboard. I need to make sure I'm following all the rules perfectly to maintain good standing. Everyone else seems to be behaving properly too - I don't want to be the one who stands out negatively.
memory: Teacher appears to be documenting student behavior on clipboard
Maintaining compliance to avoid negative attention
Noticed all other students maintaining proper classroom posture

action: Maintains upright posture while continuing to observe teacher's scoring patterns and noting which behaviors receive positive marks
thoughts: The teacher is definitely scoring compliance - I need to keep perfect posture and follow all rules exactly to earn good marks. Social acceptance depends on following the rules properly.
memory: Teacher appears to be systematically scoring student compliance behaviors
Noticed that perfect posture and attention seem to be rewarded with positive marks
